title: The manager was awesome in helping my…
text: The manager was awesome in helping my brother & me in the loss of our younger brother regarding his accounts.  DuGood also came through & helped us with another issue when no one else would.  We truly appreciate your knowledge & caring toward your customers.  It did not go unnoticed & you now have several family members who are new customers because of it.  Thank you again!

title: Excellent staff and service provided by…
text: Excellent staff and service provided by this company, as a long time customer i have no problems with them, thanks!

title: Everyone was so kind and welcoming the…
text: Everyone was so kind and welcoming the second we walked in. They were so friendly,  patient and so very helpful. It was a painless first experience and it couldn't have gone better. I am so glad I chose them and I look forward to all of my future visits. ❤️🥰

title: Excellent credit union
text: Excellent credit union! I have banked with them for the last 11 years and they only get better with time! Fast, efficient service every time!

title: Absolutely amazing customer service
text: Absolutely amazing customer service, exactly what you want and need in your banking!!! It’s just what we received, when the team from DuGood Credit Union processed our new loan. Connie Tassin and Sandra Flanagan were amazing and handled every detail and made it quick and easy!!! We always recommend to our family and friends DuGood! Thank you!!!

title: Jada Needham was amazing today
text: Jada Needham was amazing today. She helped me get a transfer done for my accounts and helped to get my student’s account linked. Thank you! She is amazing!

title: Professional
text: The speed in which I was helped; the professionalism of the ladies who helped me; and all were very polite.

title: Extremely easy to refinance my truck
text: Extremely easy to refinance my truck.  I never had to leave my desk at work to go in and sign anything. Everything was done via text or Docusign. This saved me time and money !!!  I’ll be calling back to refinance my husbands truck next!

title: Went to DuGood to take care of some…
text: Went to DuGood to take care of some business with my sister and ended up opening a personal account. Everyone I encountered were nice, professional and gave great customer service. A big shout out to the lady’s at 1795 N Major Dr Beaumont Tx. Very sweet lady waiting to greet you in the lobby. Thank you new accounts Dept. Sorry I don’t remember names but I think one is Christy

title: "Good ole' Days" Hometown Credit Union Service
text: Unbeatable customer service on every visit. This branch brings back memories of the "good ole' days" when hometown Credit Union service was first class..

title: Kara did a great job!
text: Kara did a great job of helping us get our loan together and helping us understand the process. We are so thankful for her helping us get our car!

title: Last minute call
text: I called in after 5 to have a payment stopped and Stephany explained everything to us and got the paperwork sent over for us to sign and return all before closing time. She was easy to work with and fantastic at customer service. I seriously cannot sing her praises enough

title: Outstanding customer service
text: Cara Bryant has been overly patient and very attentive. She answers any / all questions and, if she doesn't know the answer, will find out any info needed to make things go smoother. 10/10 would recommend her to friends

title: Every time that I have used Dugood for…
text: Every time that I have used Dugood for any financial purposes I have been pleased. This last time was no different. The personal at Dugood have always helped with any questions that I have had without any pressure from them at all.

title: The help and open line of communication…
text: The help and open line of communication we had with Ashley during the loan process.

title: New Du Good Customer
text: I am a New Du Good Customer. I will say Branch Supervisor Kennedie at The Nederland Branch made my experience stress free and quick. Kennedie provide excellent customer service, very friendly greeting with a beautiful smile. Thank you Kennedie for make my experience stress free.😃

title: Thanks  too  raven Smith every one…
text: Thanks  too  raven Smith every one from. Bottom  heart this bank is a awesome  place ....always makes you feel like  family  ...thank you  nall..street  port neches  dugood federal credit union

title: Great customer service and friendly…
text: Great customer service and friendly professional staff. Opening a new account was painless.

title: Great customer service
text: I had a Great experience,Great customer service and friendly…Very easy to communicate withGreat customer service and friendly professional staff. Opening a new account was painless.

title: The one thing that makes my experience…
text: The one thing that makes my experience great at DuGood in Lumberton, Texas is the customer service. From Deanna on down to the everyone else there’s always helpful great atmosphere helpful and that is a great experience at the Lumberton branch. Also, they are able to help me with any banking need that I have. I’ve never had a problem or ever had them not be able to help with something. I have been with several credit unions in the area over the years and do good outshines them all. I love DuGood.

title: Joint account possible ...or no??
text: Customer service was stellar, however, we were expecting to be set up with a joint account (two names) and I was the only one on it. I think we figured it out though.

title: Dugood works for its customers!
text: Taylor Amy went above and beyond to get my loan approved and funded. I also have excellent experiences in the past with the customer service agent, Stephanie Gallo

title: Mrs Cudd
text: Mrs. D. Cudd went above and beyond on helping me with a truck purchase. The first truck had a break problem before I took delivery. Over the weekend a national recall was announced on the truck I had selected. On Monday Ms. Cudd canceled the deal at my request. After finding another truck she got me in it by Thursday.

title: Jada is awesome
text: Jada is awesome. I can usually figure out where things are on the website.  But I was stumped.  Called her and she was able to get me to what I needed.  She is beyond friendly and deserves all good things this life and DuGood have to offer!

title: My expérience credit union I discovered…
text: My expérience credit union I discovered how à financial institution can genuinely for it's membres by offering personalized services that meet or unique needs

title: Because yall are very respectful and…
text: Because yall are very respectful and yall are very helpful

title: Tennille Ramsey was awesome
text: Tennille Ramsey was awesome. She was very professional and friendly. She went above and beyond her member services tasks to help me with my issue! If I had to score her 5- stars are not enough! She's definitely 💯 grand!!!

title: A+ Service  Cara Bryant is the Best
text: A+ Service  Cara Bryant is the Best

title: Professional team
text: Working with everyone was great. Very knowledgable team who take time to make me comfortable with the procedure.

title: I’m new in town and I decided to…
text: I’m new in town and I decided to enrolled in this new credit union.I would like to tell everyone,this is an awesome amazing credit union.The staff is extremely helpful and knowledgeable of all my questions I asked.Ms. Morgan was my representative and she informed me of all the key details.Like overdraft, password protection the savings plan and much more she told me about.Thank you DuGood credit union.

title: Turned into great Experience
text: From the first time I talked with Amanda Harrington I was made to feel welcome and that she was there to answer any question I had. She walked me through the whole process and I felt like a valued client.I had a deal on another vehicle and a loan from another institute but I choose to do business with DuGood because of her. I plan on doing more here as well.

title: DuGood makes everything so easy
text: DuGood makes everything so easy! The loan process was simple our rep’s communication was excellent. Couldn’t ask for a better experience. Thanks DuGood!

title: Working with the folks at DuGood has always been pleasant.
text: Working with the folks at DuGood has always been pleasant. When I applied for a loan in the past, the officers were helpful & made the application process easy. Times are hard right now & consolidating a credit card with another institution was my goal. My loan officer was kind & courteous. The process for approval was very quick & I am thankful. I believe this institution understands that communities are struggling, as a whole, & applying for a loan can be uncomfortable. I want to say that I am happy to be a member of DuGood.

title: Mrs.Harrington went above and beyond to…
text: Mrs.Harrington went above and beyond to help us with our auto loan, going as far as working after hours to help us complete our process. We can’t say enough about how easy she made this experience. We can’t recommend Dugood and Mrs.Harrington enough!!!

title: I went into the Nederland location to…
text: I went into the Nederland location to open a savings and 3 checking accounts. Kennedy assisted me. I was in a time crunch with a pending grocery pick up and she accommodated me with a friendly, kind and knowledgeable attitude. It was much appreciated & I look forward to banking with DuGood.

title: Very flattering.
text: I call frequently to handle business and I find it very flattering when the ladies I speak to remember me by name and former conversation, as Jada did with my last phone call. My wife and I have been with Dugood for more than 25 years and feel like a part of a family.

title: Erin gave me the best series experience…
text: Erin gave me the best series experience every.

title: Mrs. Willie
text: Mrs. Willie is professional, friendly and knowledgeable. She is a delight and I hope she is rewarded for her excellent customer service. Mrs. Willie was able to help resolve all issues in a timely, pleasant manner!

title: I applied for an auto refinancing loan…
text: I applied for an auto refinancing loan and it was processed the same day. Tracy at the Beaumont Eastex Freeway location was walked me through the process and was extremely helpful, friendly and professional. I couldn’t have been more pleased.

title: Loan Officer Sara
text: Loan Officer Sara was very pleasant, professional, and knowledgeable. She was attentive to my issue and understood my concern for the requested loan amount. Sara promptly started the loan process. I received a call from Sara at 4:15 p.m. the same day with an approval. The contract was signed around 5:15 p.m. Thank you DuGood, and Sara, for your help! Great Company!!

title: DuGood with no hassle experience
text: First of all, the workers behind the counter actually knew who we were.  So quick and easy to get a loan. No hassle. We were in and out in a matter of minutes.  Their helpfulness is very much appreciated.

title: Personal Business
text: Tammy at the Vidor was very professional and took great care in handling our business. Thanks

title: Very reasonable and very helpful
text: Very reasonable and very helpful

title: First time refinancer
text: This was my first time to ever refinance a car.  Wasn't sure what to expect but it was such a speedy transaction.  Caryn took care of everything for me.  The whole process took less than an hour from the time I put in the loan request to signing the documents and her calling me to make sure I was happy with everything.

title: Very patient
text: Very patient, considerate, and helpful lass helped me setup my account and the account on the app. Was even patient with me having to leave and do a few things and had to return to finish setting up the app on my phone.

title: Amazing!!!!!
text: Amazing!!!!!!  I applied online.  The lady called me the next morning!!!!  She went above and beyond and I’m exceptionally happy!!!   I definitely recommend using this credit union :)

title: Online auto refinance…
text: Applied online for an auto refinance loan. Received an email the next day as well as a response in one day. Erin answered my questions in a timely manner never had to wait long for a response.

title: Service with a smileI
text: I was greeted  by several people. A young lady helped me open a checking and savings account. And even made sure I could access the app on my phone .Thanks everyone ☺️

title: New Customer Experience
text: I financed my car through DuGood and I needed to have a account through them. Decided switching banks was easier then having multiple accounts open. Talked with Christy and she was very nice and helpful. She walked me through the whole process and explained everything in a simple and easy way to understand. I got more benefits then I did with my other bank and staff was so much nicer. Thank you Christy! Would recommend doing business here if you need a good bank!

title: Very responsive and took immediate…
text: Very responsive and took immediate action on my request, enabling me to move forward with my needs. Offered direct line of communication for third parties to streamline the process, knowing the urgency. And after the excellent customer service provided- offered one of the best rates on a loan that I personally think would beat any others in the region.

title: Auto Refinance
text: We just refinanced our car because the interest rates were better.  Allie made the whole process easy and she is so kind and sweet!  We will definitely call her when we need her help again!

title: DuGood has always been good people to…
text: DuGood has always been good people to deal with; professional and polite, as well as, kind.  When I had to close my account and open a new one - the only negative comment I can make is they didn't tell me the suffix for ACH payments (for my bills) had been changed from 010 to 009; therefore, when I changed all my payment methods, I used what I had always used - 010 and my bill payments got returned.  Then when they set up my three accounts to transfer between them - they didn't tell me that you have to click a tab called "Move Money".  In the past I have always seen all the different accounts on the same page as the checking and savings, loans, etc.  So - they need to include those two pieces of information - especially with long established customers.  It took getting in touch with the lady over the digital dept. to tell me when it should have been customer service.  Otherwise, everything was great and I thank you all.

title: I had applied online
text: I had applied online. The application couldn’t be completed online. I called to see what I needed to do. They said come to the branch. A little while later Stephanie Gallo called me, asked security questions and had everything completed shortly. I didn’t have to go in to the branch.

title: In need of a loan
text: I was greeted when I entered the door! Asked to speak with a loan officer and barely sat down in the waiting area before I had someone tell me she could help me!  Ashante was very nice and listened to my needs.  In no time at all I was signing papers and on my way.  Every step of my experience was great!  Keep up the good work!

I recently needed to add am account and Ms. Wendee made it a nice and easy experience. She made sure I understood my options and helped me with whatever I didn't understand. Plus she's super sweet! Great staff at DuGood!

title: My husband and I have been with dugood…
text: My husband and I have been with dugood for many years.We mostly have interacted with Mrs. Tara Baloney She has been an absolute pleasure over the years. She makes every effort to give 100% always!

title: Shout Out goes to…
text: Stephanie at the Vidor branch went above and beyond for me in trying to settle a dispute with an account I had.  Her expert way of handling the business matter was/is much appreciated and it made me feel validated and supported.  The transfer to Allie in the Lender Department was smooth and helpful.  Big thanks goes out to Allie as well for her expert way of handling a stressful situation and helping me with paperwork to resolve the stressful situation I was in.  Bless you all!

title: Jada
text: As soon as I walked in, I was greeted by Jada Needham. She treated me like I had banked there for years. She is very well trained at her job. She answered all my question. Jada was very Professional and Friendly, her communication skills are the best I've seen! She took time with me, went over everything Dugood FCU had to offer. I don't remember the last place that had such Awesome Customer Service! So much so, my step son also opened an account. I rate her 5 stars. I would like to Thank Dugood FCU for hiring her. She is Awesome! She will get so much more buisness from me and my Family. My mother, fiance and children are in the process of moving there bank to Dugood just because of how well I was treated by Jada. We have never had such Awesome Customer Service! Dugood should give her a raise!

title: I have been with DuGood FCU for many…
text: I have been with DuGood FCU for many years. It's been nothing short of a great experience, whether I'm in the lobby to get a cashier's check, in the drive-through to make a deposit, or on the phone to refinance my house and/or car. I've found DuGood personnel consistently knowledgeable, convivial and easy to work with. I have no plans to go anywhere else.

title: Thank you Ms Marissa
text: Ms Marissa Carlin is the reason my latest experience with Dugood was great. She was very helpful, from answering my constant questions to giving me some great advice. Ms Marissa didn't stop at the first obstacle and give up on helping me, she worked to take care of my concerns and got me going in the right direction. I am very thankful for her assistance.
